text: Dikembe Mutombo Mpolondo Mukamba Jean-Jacques WamutomboDikembe Mutombo . basketball-reference.com (June 25, 1966 - September 30, 2024) was a Congolese- American professional basketball player and humanitarian. Mutombo played 18 seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA). He played for the Denver Nuggets, Atlanta Hawks, Philadelphia 76ers, New Jersey Nets, New York Knicks and the Houston Rockets. In October 2022, Mutombo announced that he was undergoing treatment for a brain tumor. He died from brain cancer in Atlanta, Georgia on September 30, 2024 at the age of 58. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American philanthropists Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Cancer deaths in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo basketball players Category:Denver Nuggets players Category:Houston Rockets players Category:National Basketball Association players with retired numbers Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:New Jersey Nets players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Philadelphia 76ers players
title: Dikembe Mutombo
